# Introduction to the document {.unnumbered}

::: {.column-margin .panel-tabset group="side"}
### Onside = Right {.unnumbered}
bow paddler paddles on the right side

### Onside = Left {.unnumbered}
bow paddler paddles on the left side
:::

The onside (paddle side) is defined by the paddle side of the bow paddler.
[FFor the maneuver sketches you can choose the onside in the tabs on the right. Unfortunately, I have not yet managed to have the selection transferred to the next page.]{.content-visible when-format="html"}

For some maneuvers, there are several alternatives of what can be done. Those are denoted as lists in the tables.

In the sketches, the left sketch shows turning direction and paddle placement and the right sketch the heel (viewed from the stern) relative to the paddle.

Bei einigen Manövern gibt es verschiedene Alternativen, was gemacht werden kann. Diese sind in der Tabelle als Aufzählung gelistest.
